item.title: Minister denies Budget leaks have damaged economy
item.description: A former Bank of England chief economist says Budget speculation has "caused paralysis for businesses and consumers".

item.title: A 'special day' for Eze - but can anyone challenge Arsenal for title?
item.description: After Eberechi Eze's hat-trick helps Arsenal to a 4-1 win against Tottenham, BBC Sport takes a closer look at the Gunners' title challenge.

item.title: Eze hits hat-trick as Arsenal thrash Tottenham
item.description: Eberechi Eze scores a hat-trick to help Arsenal thump rivals Tottenham 4-1 and go six points clear at the top of the Premier League - despite a moment...

item.title: Israel kills top Hezbollah official in first attack on Beirut in months
item.description: Israel has escalated its campaign on targets it says are linked to Hezbollah, raising fears of a resumption of hostilities.

item.title: Watch: Lava spews out from Hawaii's Kilauea as volcano erupts again
item.description: According to the United States Geological Survey, this is the 37th eruption episode since December 2024.
